name: Gabriele Gaetano Fronzé
bio: With a foundation in Nuclear and Subnuclear Physics, I've channeled my scientific rigor into creating robust, scalable cloud solutions.

name: Filippo Valle
highlight: Physicist, Ph.D. in Complex Systems for Life Sciences
bio: Curious by nature, I Love coding and data mining. | I studied Complex Systems and now I am leading the tech team to simplify the clouds.

name: Giulia Sannai
bio: CMO at Elemento Cloud, bridging strategy, technology, and creativity. Musicologist, musician, and educator with a passion for bold ideas, social media, and all things fuchsia.

name: Gianluca Costa
bio: I'm one of the lucky few who turned their passion into a career. I started out as a software developer, and along the way, I fell in love with the more tangible side of IT: hardware infrastructure.

name: Stefano Galfré
bio: As CFO, I bring financial expertise and strategic vision to Elemento Cloud, ensuring sustainable growth and sound fiscal management.

name: Martino Mogna
bio: Started with chemistry, ventured into physics, now a developer. Turns out, I was just moving from one puzzle to the next. Always curious, always building, always learning.

name: Vincent Morello
bio: Shaping visuals and identities always seeking the key to reinterpreting the ordinary

name: Andrea Riccardi
bio: Passionate programmer with a love for computer science and video games, driven by the desire to understand how things work

name: Nicola Gutierrez
bio: Software Engineer specialized in artificial intelligence and data. Interested in data processing and acquisition, model optimization, and AI integration.

name: Filippo Ferrando Damillano
bio: R&D Developer at Elemento Cloud and Computer Science student passionate about Linux systems and virtualization technologies. Always eager to explore new tech challenges and learn as much as possible!

name: Paolo Beci
bio: MSc Cloud Engineer @PoliTO, passionate about computer science, innovation, and economics. Always seeking new challenges and growth opportunities.

name: Giulia Borgoni
bio: Engineer and computer science teacher. Passionate about mountains, travel and innovation. Always curious, always learning

name: Marco Garro
bio: I am a computer science student who loves music and low-level programming. I've been fortunate to work with Elemento since 2023.

name: Simone Robaldo
bio: IT Student and programmer that enjoys photography in his free time.

name: Giorgio Torchio
bio: Passionate about books and everything related to computer science. I particularly enjoy studying algorithms, multimedia formats, and network protocols.

name: Lorenzo Canciani
bio: MSc Cybersecurity student @PoliTO, passionate about anything that works autonomously. If I don't understand how it works, I simply take it apart. Yes, I'm curious too!

name: Pamela Gerbotto
bio: As Support Specialist, I provide technical assistance and ensure smooth customer experiences, bridging the gap between users and our solutions.
